casebody.data:
In the Matter of A.P. No. 534A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 11, 2006. Katherine Chester, for Mother-Parks. Robert Newman, Asheboro, for Father-Parks. Gary Rhodes, Salisbury, for Hylton. Randi Weiss, Winston-Salem, for Guardian ad Litem.

Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 634 S.E.2d 561.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th day of October 2006 by Petitioner (Forsyth DSS) for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 11th day of October 2006."
